Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.29191658]Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=1.0 μM), Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=2.0 μM), Enterococcus faecalis (MIC=2.0 μM);Fungus:Candida albicans (MIC=2.0 μM).Cancer cell lines:NCI-H157 (IC50=3.398 μM), U251MG (IC50=3.520 μM), PC-3 (IC50=27.62 μM), MDA-MB-435s (IC50=9.864 μM), HMEC-1 (IC50=40.30 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.29191658]HC50=531.7 μM against horse red blood cells
Sequence Information.Function: Antimicrobial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and fungi. Weak hemolytic activity.
